title: Preseason Winners/Losers and a Mock Draft Review (08/16 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Bid on our Draft-A-Thon items right now to benefit St. Jude! http://cbssports.com/ebay
Follow our draft here: https://www.cbssports.com/fantasy/football/news/fantasy-football-mock-draft-august-ppr-mock-takes-an-odd-turn-to-the-nfc-east/
Football! Yes, we are reacting to football, and it's very exciting. Let's start with some preseason winners (1:40) as Jamey was impressed by a few rookie WRs, but does Amon-ra St. Brown have enough of a role to be successful? The rookie QBs flashed in their debuts and Phillip Lindsay (8:15) might be a Top 100 pick now. Meanwhile, our list of preseason losers (9:30) is headlined by Myles Gaskin. How far down the rankings is he moving? We also tell you why Adam Trautman was a loser and we discuss other rookie RBs (some good, some bad) as well ... We'll update you on the latest NFL news and notes (18:45). Curtis Samuel is off the PUP list and looks like a draft bargain right now ... It's Mock Draft Monday (22:00) and we'll review our 12-team, 3-WR PPR draft. One drafter's entire team is from the NFC East! And it's good! Jamey made it a point to draft WRs early. Adam laments his lack of upside. Chris is very happy with his team even though his QB situation is a little weak. Find out why Chris doesn't think that's an issue. And we also discuss the Round 6/7 RBs (45:30) and rank Michael Carter, Chase Edmonds, Javonte Williams and Kareem Hunt ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Preseason Winners/Losers and a Mock Draft Review (08/16 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: We tell you the lessons we learned from a recent mock draft comparing safety vs. upside, and we talk about the big preseason storylines. Myles Gaskin!
